topics.body: Well Obama just shanked the anti-glbt movement in the ass hard; he's making a new rule under the Family and Medical Leave Act that will grant same-sex couples the same medical benefits and so forth.  If you're wondering what this means essentially the anti-glbt movement just got wrecked hard.

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a3d8116368722672090100#post_53a3d8116368722672090100
Hey, half the time I consider myself asexual :P  Asexual ain't boring, it's just more focused on the _purely_ romantic side of things and sacrificing the sexual side, which... Okay, can seem a liiittle bit boring, fine, but still!  It's fun for people who just like being with others rather than being... in? others?
Wow that didn't end up how I wanted it to, oh well

Though I did also say _half_ of the time.  Because yes, sexuality is, indeed, awesome :I
